name: General Chemistry I
description: Introduction to the fundamental principles of chemistry, including atomic and molecular structure, chemical reactions, stoichiometry, and thermodynamics.

name: General Chemistry II
description: Continuation of General Chemistry I, covering topics such as intermolecular forces, solutions, kinetics, equilibrium, acid-base chemistry, and electrochemistry.

name: Organic Chemistry I
description: Introduction to organic chemistry, including bonding, functional groups, nomenclature, synthesis, and reaction mechanisms.

name: Organic Chemistry II
description: Continuation of Organic Chemistry I, covering topics such as aromatic compounds, carbonyl chemistry, amines, carboxylic acids, and spectroscopy.

name: Polymer Chemistry
description: Introduction to the chemistry of polymers, including synthesis, characterization, reactions, and physical properties.

name: Physical Chemistry I
description: Introduction to the principles of physical chemistry, including thermodynamics, quantum mechanics, and statistical mechanics.

name: Physical Chemistry II
description: Continuation of Physical Chemistry I, covering topics such as spectroscopy, kinetics, surface chemistry, and electrochemistry.

name: Materials Science
description: Introduction to the science of materials, including structure, characterization, properties, and applications.

name: Advanced Polymer Chemistry
description: Advanced topics in polymer chemistry, including polymerization mechanisms, supramolecular assemblies, and functional polymers.
